name: Rising Force
description:
FPS work in progress. This will be a multiplayer game (after some time), but I am still working on the first person character and the environment. There are no AI's, yet I could decide to make this a single player game as well.

Please leave feedback for me to improve my game.

Controls:

  • W A S D + mouse: Movement
  • RMB - Aim down sight
  • LMB - Fire
  • R - Reload
  • V - Switch fire mode
  • T - Flashlight
  • Control - Crouch
  • Shift - Sprint
  • Space - Jump
  • Q/E - Lean (future update)
